name: goodfin
headline: Building the next generation of wealth
description: We are reimagining private wealth management today for the high net worth individuals of tomorrow. Our customers are founders, investors and professionals all over the world.

founders.name: Anna Joo Fee, Founder
founders.description: Anna is a second-time fintech founder and former regulatory lawyer. She is a graduate of Harvard College and Harvard Law School.

[Join goodfin to register for our events ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65491887f5eb9d5ff1886bd6/664462c765bfe0435554c72f_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)](http://www.goodfin.com/<https:/events.goodfin.com/>)
# Level Up Your Portfolio
Join our exclusive community to invest in the world’s most innovative companies and supercharge your wealth with AI.
[Get Started](http://www.goodfin.com/<https:/app.goodfin.com/request-access>)
What are the latest investment opportunities?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65491887f5eb9d5ff1886bd6/65676297bf5f5b12987a4ed8_GoodFinAI.svg)
We have just announced the following offerings:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65491887f5eb9d5ff1886bd6/656a32560ef9e8f4f049cb0a_SpaceX.png)
SpaceX
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65491887f5eb9d5ff1886bd6/656a1fe81d0200daa27061e0_YCFavicon.svg)
Y Combinator S23 Startups
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65491887f5eb9d5ff1886bd6/6567ee00c86aad532f5e3fe6_Favicon256.png)
Custom Portfolio
1 — Access premium opportunities
# Curated investments
Invest in institutional-quality, hard-to-access alternative assets including blue-chip private equity and credit funds, pre-IPO companies and top venture-backed startups. Our tech enables you to invest at industry-low minimums and manage liquidity.
[Get Access](http://www.goodfin.com/<https:/app.goodfin.com/request-access>)
2 — Meet your AI concierge
# Your new superpower
Ask GoodFin AI for personalized answers to investment strategies in alternative assets. Designed to help you navigate your financial journey with confidence.
[Get Access](http://www.goodfin.com/<https:/app.goodfin.com/request-access>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65491887f5eb9d5ff1886bd6/656a358f05c2c075f6e87bef_GoodFinAI2.png)
3 — Join a Private Global Community
# An exclusive network
Our membership is a diverse group of ambitious individuals passionate about building the future – founders, investors and professionals around the world whose collective net worth exceeds $1B.
[Get Access](http://www.goodfin.com/<https:/app.goodfin.com/request-access>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65491887f5eb9d5ff1886bd6/656e105b1df07c2e45040657_community.png)
Expand your circle
Connect with GoodFin members ranging from startup founders to C-suite executives for 1:1 chats.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65491887f5eb9d5ff1886bd6/656e0cae9a233c9b49513281_events.png)
Members-only events
Be invited to special events including in-person dinners, happy hours, and virtual webinars.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65491887f5eb9d5ff1886bd6/6567580d4c681f5af16b291e_Lock.svg)
4 — Enjoy peace of mind
# Private and secure
Your privacy is our priority. You don’t have to share sensitive personal data to use our AI. We use the same security measures as big banks and encrypt your sensitive personal data with Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) 256-bit encryption protocol.
[Get Access](http://www.goodfin.com/<https:/app.goodfin.com/request-access>)
# About GoodFin
Can’t find what you’re looking for? Get support from our white glove service team.
Write to us
What is GoodFin?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65491887f5eb9d5ff1886bd6/656e0e7c203f845f48e12145_chevron_down.svg)
GoodFin is a U.S. venture-backed startup building a next generation wealth technology platform. We are pioneering “wealth intelligence” with GoodFin AI. Picture a financial genius at your fingertips, designed to be transparent, personalized and reliable. GoodFin is a technology company, not a traditional wealth management firm or private bank. We are reimagining a services-based industry that has historically catered to high net worth individuals.
How do I give feedback or get help?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65491887f5eb9d5ff1886bd6/656e0e7c203f845f48e12145_chevron_down.svg)
We always appreciate and value feedback. Please email us any time at hello@goodfin.com.
# Stay In The Know
Drop your email and stay updated. Right from your inbox.
Email Address
Thank you! Your submission has been received!

generated_description:
**GoodFin: Redefining Wealth Management with AI**

Founded in 2022 and hailing from Y Combinator's W22 batch, GoodFin is on a mission to build the next generation of wealth through innovative tech. Based in Los Angeles and operating with a lean team of 7, the company's primary focus is on providing high-net-worth individuals with a fresh, AI-driven approach to private wealth management. Their clients include founders, investors, and professionals from around the globe.

What sets GoodFin apart? It’s the concept of “wealth intelligence” powered by GoodFin AI—essentially a financial genius ready to tailor investment strategies to individual needs. Imagine a platform that doesn't just manage your wealth but advises you on it in a personalized manner, making the complex world of investing more accessible and understandable.

GoodFin's offerings allow access to exclusive investment opportunities in hard-to-reach alternative assets, including blue-chip private equity, credit funds, and pre-IPO companies—all curated for industry-low minimums. This means you can dive into innovative companies like SpaceX and other Y Combinator startups, all while being supported by an AI concierge that helps you navigate your investment journey with confidence.

But that’s not all. GoodFin serves as a networking hub, fostering connections among its members—an exclusive group of forward-thinking individuals whose collective net worth exceeds $1 billion. Members can engage in 1:1 chats, attend special events ranging from dinners to webinars, and interact within this dynamic community focused on shaping the future.

Security is a priority at GoodFin. The company employs advanced encryption similar to what banks use to safeguard your personal data, ensuring your information is as secure as possible.

In essence, GoodFin is a game-changer in the fintech space, blending cutting-edge technology with wealth management. The aim is not just to cater to the wealthy but to arm the wealth builders of tomorrow with the tools and connections they need to thrive amidst evolving market landscapes.

For more information, you can visit [GoodFin's website](http://www.goodfin.com).
